message.content:
I'd be happy to help you with a healthy meal plan that accommodates your dietary restrictions! Here's a 7-day meal plan that excludes dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews:

**Monday**

* Breakfast: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs
	+ Whole wheat toast topped with mashed avocado, poached eggs, salt, and pepper
* Lunch: Grilled Chicken Salad with Berries
	+ Mixed greens, grilled chicken breast, mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries), chopped bell peppers, and a citrus vinaigrette dressing
* Dinner: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl with Roasted Vegetables
	+ Cooked quinoa, black beans, roasted sweet potatoes, Brussels sprouts, and red onions, topped with a drizzle of olive oil and lemon juice

**Tuesday**

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with Banana and Coconut Flakes
	+ Steel-cut oats cooked with coconut milk, sliced banana, and shredded coconut flakes
* Lunch: Lentil Soup with Whole Grain Bread
	+ Hearty lentil soup made with red lentils, onions, carrots, celery, and vegetable broth, served with a side of whole grain bread
* Dinner: Grilled Salmon with Roasted Asparagus and Brown Rice
	+ Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, roasted asparagus, and brown rice cooked with olive oil and lemon juice

**Wednesday**

* Breakfast: Smoothie Bowl with Banana, Spinach, and Coconut Milk
	+ Blended banana, spinach, coconut milk, and ice topped with sliced almonds-free granola and shredded coconut flakes
* Lunch: Turkey and Avocado Wrap with Mixed Greens
	+ Whole wheat wrap filled with sliced turkey breast, avocado, mixed greens, cucumber slices, and a drizzle of hummus
* Dinner: Grilled Shrimp with Quinoa and Steamed Broccoli
	+ Marinated shrimp grilled to perfection, cooked quinoa, and steamed broccoli florets

**Thursday**

* Breakfast: Chia Seed Pudding with Coconut Milk and Berries
	+ Chia seeds soaked in coconut milk, topped with mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) and a sprinkle of shredded coconut flakes
* Lunch: Grilled Chicken Breast with Roasted Carrots and Brown Rice
	+ Marinated chicken breast grilled to perfection, roasted carrots, and brown rice cooked with olive oil and lemon juice
* Dinner: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu and Brown Rice
	+ Stir-fry made with firm tofu, mixed vegetables (bell peppers, onions, mushrooms), and brown rice, seasoned with soy sauce and sesame oil

**Friday**

* Breakfast: Whole Grain Waffles with Fresh Berries and Coconut Whipped Cream
	+ Homemade whole grain waffles topped with fresh berries and a dollop of coconut whipped cream made with full-fat coconut milk
* Lunch: Chickpea Salad with Mixed Greens and Lemon-Tahini Dressing
	+ Cooked chickpeas mixed with chopped cucumber, bell peppers, and red onions, dressed with a lemon-tahini dressing made without garlic
* Dinner: Grilled Steak with Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Sweet Potatoes
	+ Grilled steak cooked to perfection, roasted Brussels sprouts, and sweet potatoes, topped with a drizzle of olive oil and lemon juice

**Saturday**

* Breakfast: Coconut Rice Pudding with Fresh Mango
	+ Cooked coconut rice pudding flavored with vanilla extract, topped with fresh mango slices
* Lunch: Turkey and Avocado Salad with Mixed Greens
	+ Mixed greens, sliced turkey breast, avocado, cucumber slices, and a drizzle of hummus dressing
* Dinner: Baked Cod with Quinoa and Steamed Green Beans
	+ Fresh cod fillet baked to perfection, cooked quinoa, and steamed green beans

**Sunday**

* Breakfast: Whole Grain Pancakes with Fresh Berries and Coconut Syrup
	+ Homemade whole grain pancakes topped with fresh berries and a drizzle of coconut syrup made without honey
* Lunch: Grilled Chicken Breast with Roasted Asparagus and Quinoa
	+ Marinated chicken breast grilled to perfection, roasted asparagus, and cooked quinoa
* Dinner: Vegetable Curry with Brown Rice and Naan Bread (made without dairy)
	+ Hearty vegetable curry made with a variety of vegetables (carrots, potatoes, peas), brown rice, and naan bread (made without dairy)

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. You can also consider incorporating other healthy beverages like coconut water or herbal tea. Enjoy your meal plan!
